original_title: Willie Colón & Rubén Blades - Live In Venezuela
overview: Concert in Venezuela at the July 1998 under the AMNISTIA festival. Here Ruben forgets a part of the lyrics and the musicians, although they still play, are surprised at what happened.  TrackList  01. Que Sera  02. Pablo Pueblo  03. Idilio  04. Pedro Navaja  05. Gitana  06. Buscando Guayaba  07. El Gran Varon  08. Nacimiento De Ramiro  09. Plástico  10. Plantacion adentro,  11. Homenaje a Hector Lavoe
tagline: Tremendos artista, tremenda orquesta, honor a los grandes. VIVA LA SALSA!!!
title: Willie Colón & Rubén Blades - Live In Venezuela
